Name: Average resolution time following 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Average delay caused by 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' in the process flow
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of cases involving 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' to the next activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Difference in average time between 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and 'Accepted + In Progress' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Average time to resolve a case after 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of cases involving 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Vendor and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and 'Completed + Resolved' compared to 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Total time cases spend in 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' before moving to any 'Completed' status
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Completed'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' to 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Difference in total resolution time between cases with and without 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and the end of case where activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor does not occur
